wikipedia_page.main: Sir Stewart Thomas Cole  (born 1955) is a British/French microbiologist. He has been the director general of the Pasteur Institute since January 2018.

response: As a private, non-profit organization, the Institut Pasteur is governed by an independent board of directors, currently chaired by François Ailleret. The director-general is Stewart Cole.
